amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to add findings that condemn Hamas and Iran-backed terror groups for using "human shields" and that only the unconditional surrender of Hamas and other Iran-backed terror groups will save innocent civilian lives.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds findings that condemn Hamas and Iran-backed terror groups for using "human shields" and that only the unconditional surrender of Hamas and other Iran-backed terror groups will save innocent civilian lives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 11, 1 Present (Roll no. 680).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 11, 1 Present (Roll no. 680).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 11, 1 Present (Roll no. 680).
